title: Pixel4 does not boot up after I left it for charging overnight
content:
Hello. I left my Pixel 4 for charging overnight, and the phone turned off by itself and rebooted. However, the booting was stopped in the Google animation and didn't proceed afterward.
The phone didn't boot with several force reboot attempts.
I tried to reset my phone in recovery mode. Though the formatting was done correctly, the phone still stuck in the same animation while booting.
Is there any possible solution for the problem?
